title: O/L Admission now ONLINE
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Examinations announced that facilities have been provided to download the admission cards of the 2021 GCE O/Ls from the department’s website.

Commissioner-General of Examinations L.M.D. Dharmasena advised candidates who are YET to receive the admission card, to visit the Examinations Department website via, WWW.DOENETS.LK to download a copy of the admission card, by entering the NIC number or the Examination Number.
